pr_title: Enhance VarByteChunkSVForwardIndexReader to directly read from data buffer for uncompressed data

timeline.author: siddharthteotia

timeline.bodyText: Why the algorithm for getting endoffset or startOffset for next row is different for uncompressed?
timeline.author: siddharthteotia

replies.bodyText: Algorithm is slightly different because with the chunkBuffer we can directly get the chunkEndOffset via chunkBuffer.limit(), which is not the case for the uncompressed one. That is why we have a branch on the last chunk.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
